body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
DescribeWorkflowExecutionResponse doesn't contain information if a workflow has received a cancellation request.
This information is useful for troubleshooting.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Either add CANCELLATION_REQUESTED status to WorkflowExecutionStatus enum or add some other field to DescribeWorkflowExecutionResponse that indicates that cancellation was requested.
title: Consider adding CANCELLATION_REQUESTED status to WorkflowExecutionStatus
